rows.label: tlk4170042102_msg0001
rows.name:
Now then, everyone.
Let's try to express the scenery of Liberalitas
in writing.

rows.label: tlk4170042102_msg0002
rows.name:
You must choose your words so that others can picture
the scene in their minds just by reading them.

rows.label: tlk4170042102_msg0003
rows.name:
Direct expressions lack emotion, you see.
It is all about how poetically you can express it!
